bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA): Exchanging Test Results and Session Information via the eXtensible Markup Language(XML)
IEEE Standard for Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA): Exchanging Test Results and Session Information via the eXtensible Markup Language(XML)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended to promote and facilitate interoperability between components of an automatic test system (e.g., between test executive and diagnostic reasoner)where test results need to be shared. The standard thus facilitates the capture of test results data in storage devices and databases, facilitating online and offline analysis. The test results schema becomes a class of information that can be used within the SIMICA family of standards.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

IEEE Std 1636.1-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std 1636.1-2007) - Redline

bibdata.keyword: Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA)
